greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Transpose of array A246278: A(row,1) = 2*row, and for col > 1, A(row,col) = A003961(A(row,col-1)).
comment: Permutation of natural numbers larger than 1.
See comments in A246278 (the same array transposed).
formula: If col = 1, A(row,col) = 2*row, otherwise A(row,col) = A003961(A(row,col-1)).
example: The top-left corner of the array:
program: (define (A246278bi row col) (if (= 1 row) (* 2 col) (A003961 (A246278bi (- row 1) col))))
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Aug 21 2014
